provider.title: Update provider
provider.description: Entity who is creating or directly responsible for the update. It can be a company name.

name.title: Update name
name.description: Identifier for a class of update. It can be a device class or model name.

version.title: Update version
version.description: Two to four part dot separated numerical version numbers. Each part must be a number between 0 and 2147483647 and leading zeroes will be dropped.

compatibility.title: Update compatibility
compatibility.description: List of device property sets this update is compatible with.

compatibilityInfo.title: Update compatibility info
compatibilityInfo.description: Properties of a device this update is compatible with.

file.title: Update file
file.description: Update payload file, e.g. binary, firmware, script, etc. Must be unique within update.

sizeInBytes.title: File size
sizeInBytes.description: File size in number of bytes.

fileHashes.title: File hashes
fileHashes.description: Base64-encoded file hashes with algorithm name as key. At least SHA-256 algorithm must be specified, and additional algorithm may be specified if supported by agent.

sha256.title: SHA-256 hash value
sha256.description: Base64-encoded file hash value using SHA-256 algorithm.

referenceStepType.title: 'Reference' step type
referenceStepType.description: Instruction step type that installs another update.

inlineStepType.title: 'Inline' step type
inlineStepType.description: Instruction step type that performs code execution.

inlineStepHandler.title: Step handler
inlineStepHandler.description: Identity of handler on device that can execute this step.

inlineStepHandlerProperties.title: Handler properties
inlineStepHandlerProperties.description: JSON object that agent will pass to handler as arguments.

description: Shared schema definitions for 'Import Manifest' and 'Update Manifest'.
title: JSON Schema Definitions for Azure Device Update for IoT Hub Manifests version 4.0
